verses.name: Genesis 30:18
verses.text: And Leah said, God hath given me my hire, because I have given my maiden to my husband: and she called his name Issachar.

verses.name: Genesis 30:19
verses.text: And Leah conceived again, and bare Jacob the sixth son.

verses.name: Genesis 30:20
verses.text: And Leah said, God hath endued me with a good dowry; now will my husband dwell with me, because I have born him six sons: and she called his name Zebulun.

verses.name: Genesis 30:21
verses.text: And afterwards she bare a daughter, and called her name Dinah.

verses.name: Genesis 30:22
verses.text: And God remembered Rachel, and God hearkened to her, and opened her womb.
